item.title: Looping
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

public void clickMouse(int delay) {
    for( ; ; ) {
        if (Gui.isApplet) {
            try {
                autoClickObjectID(6570);
                bot.delay(10);
            }
            catch (Throwable throwable) {
	        client.log("Error.");
	        return;
            }
        }
    }
}

or

public void clickMouse(int delay) {
    while(true) {
        if (Gui.isApplet) {
            try {
                autoClickObjectID(6570);
                bot.delay(10);
            }
            catch (Throwable throwable) {
	        client.log("Error.");
	        return;
            }
        }
    }
}

item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

How would i make this loop forever

How would i make this loop infinit?

public void clickMouse(int delay) { if (Gui.isApplet) try { Robot bot = new Robot(); autoClickObjectID(6570); bot.delay(10); } catch (Throwable throwable) { client.log("Error."); return; }
